results.title: Takotsubo Cardiomyopathy as a Cardiovascular Manifestation of COVID-19: A Case Report and Literature Review
results.text_hl: Ventriculography showed anteroapical and inferoapical @<m>DISEASE_Fetal_akinesia_syndrome_X_linked</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C537921 @@@akinesia@@@ consistent with @DISEASE_Takotsubo_Cardiomyopathy @DISEASE_MESH:D054549 @@@TCM@@@.

citations.NLM: Noor F, Ogunleye OO, Ajibola O, Malik S, Cluzet V. Takotsubo Cardiomyopathy as a Cardiovascular Manifestation of COVID-19: A Case Report and Literature Review Cureus. 2022 Oct;14(10):e30005. PMID: 36348889

results.title: Recurrent left ventricular apical ballooning syndrome in a patient with pheochromocytoma.
results.text_hl: A similar episode of @DISEASE_Chest_Pain @DISEASE_MESH:D002637 @@@chest pain@@@ occurred 4 years ago with same angiographic findings and reversible @<m>DISEASE_Fetal_akinesia_syndrome_X_linked</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C537921 @@@inferobasal akinesia@@@.

citations.NLM: Celebi H, Erdim R, Karabay KO, Yildirimturk O, Aytekin V. Recurrent left ventricular apical ballooning syndrome in a patient with pheochromocytoma. Int J Angiol. 2012 Mar;21(1):63-8. PMID: 23449065
